summary: This document is an email communication between Paul Morris and Paul Barrett discussing scheduling a lunch meeting. It contains disclaimers about confidentiality and legal advice, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is mentioned as the Managing Director of the Global Investment Opportunities Group, involved in scheduling a lunch meeting.
